attributes.description:
The Creta is a very practical family vehicle.
It’s a compact cross-over which promises to deliver in all aspects.
Features of this vehicle include a Multi-Function Steering Wheel, Cruise Control, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Bluetooth Connectivity, Air-Conditioning, CD-Player, ABS, Airbags, Reverse Camera, USB Port, Power Steering, Central Locking and much more!
Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock. A 1% of the value of the vehicle non refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another nonrefundable deposit to secure it further.. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!

attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Airport Park Germiston Used Cars
attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 160 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us.
